attributes.action: Build a shell garage on the Isle of Wight
attributes.additional_details: from Subarus to fords,Nissan gtr,and Mitsubishi Evos the island car scene is crying out for the v-power fuel
attributes.background: The Isle of Wight could really do with a shell garage. The car scene has grown over the years and has become a big part of the Isle of Wight, shell are the only garage to offer the v-power nitro fuel which is essential for high performance cars I feel this is a must have for the island.
